article_title: Activist Loeb Sues Sotheby's, Challenging Poison Pill
article_text:
Activist investor Dan Loeb sued auction house Sotheby's to remove its so-called poison pill, setting up a crucial first test for a new generation of corporate defenses aimed at thwarting activist hedge funds.

Mr. Loeb's lawsuit alleges that the Sotheby's poison pill unfairly hampers his effort to shake up the company's board. The measure limits activist investors like Mr. Loeb's Third Point LLC to acquiring just under 10% of the...
